name: ToeJam & Earl: Back in the Groove! Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is the ToeJam & Earl: Back in the Groove! Soundtrack! Jam to some of Funkatron's original funky tunes as arranged and played by bassist and multi-instrumentalist Cody Wright!

Track List:
1 Theme Refunkified
2 Peabo's Party Jam
3 Rapmaster Rocket Racket
4 Rocket Rap
5 Alien Breakdown
6 Aqua Jam
7 Big Earl Bump
8 Funk Funk Funk E
9 Lewanda's Love
10 Mellow Groove
11 Ode to Sharla
12 Old School Otis
13 Groove Ship
14 Back in the Groove
15 Bloona's Dance Mix
16 Dark Level Funk
17 Big E On Da Bass
18 Flarney's Funkomatic
19 Hyperfunk Zone
20 Lamont's Funky Brain
21 Rapmaster Rhythm
22 This Crazy Planet
23 The Bass Master
24 Funkopotamous Freejam
25 Aqua Jam Unchained
26 Funk Down Under
27 Funktastic Planet
28 Slow Groovin
29 Boomin Bump
30 Groovin Like a Pulsar
31 Back in the Groove with Vocals

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen Threadripper 2990WX
  • Memory: 1024 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4x NVIDIA Tesla V100 16GB in SLI array
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: RME HDSPe Madi FX
  • Additional Notes: (100GB in the event you make 100+ copies of the soundtrack on your computer)
